title: Scale Mail
contents: text | This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish. The suit includes gauntlets.

title: Crossbow, Light
contents: description | Range | When attacking a target beyond normal range, you have disadvantage on the attack roll. You can’t attack a target beyond the weapon’s long range.
description | Loading | You can only fire one round per turn.
description | Two-Handed | Requires two hands when you attack.

title: Shield
contents: text | Made of metal, a shield is carried in one hand.  You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

title: Flute
contents: text | If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.
